post.summary: access token by email and password (login with email: superAdmin@gmail.com and password: 123)

get.description:
order pagination

 input's will be collected from request Query; 4 optional input:

page => numebr of page

limit => count of data in each page

orderBy => sort data base on provided argument

filter => filter data base on provided argument

search => search data base on provided argument

EXAMPLE => ?page=1&limit=10&orderBy={"name": "asc"}&filter={"name": "sa"}&search={"name": "sa"}

FULL URL => http://127.0.0.1:3000/api/v1/{APIADDRESS}?page=1&limit=10&orderBy={"name": "asc"}&orderBy={"id": "asc"}&filter={"name": "sa"}&search={"name": "sa"}

FULL URL V2 => http://127.0.0.1:3000/api/v1/{APIADDRESS}?page=1&limit=10&orderBy=[{"name": "asc"}]&filter=[{"name": "sa"}]&search=[{"name": "sa"}]

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: you can set any filed of model you trying to sort like {"id": "asc"}

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: filter properties are: label, operator, lte, gte; property label and operator is array of ids

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: search properties are: name, email, mobile, order_number,
